entries.text: [Progress] Named Global 1st Runner Up in the Harvard Crimson Global Quiz Bowl 2025 (CS).
[Progress] Named Individual Champion for Taiwan in the Harvard Crimson Global Quiz Bowl 2025 (CS).
[Publication] My first-authored paper, FORTRESS, has been published at TMLR
[Publication] My blog post on LLM safety was published at CyCraft Research Lab
[Progress] Scored 8.5/9.0 on IELTS Academic after self-studying!
[Improved] Reduced paper reading page LCP via build-time arXiv API caching
[Improved] Introduced a dedicated mobile staggered menu with additional UX improvements
[Improved] Wrote photography annotations for every gallery post, check them out!
[Improved] Phase 1 project content has been curated, more will be retroactively added soon
[Improved] Added full language support for English and Traditional Chinese using i18n!
[Improved] Added support for Google Drive and YouTube video links
[Activity] Gave a speech for AI WAVE Opening Ceramony at TWTC
[Research] PATCH has been submitted to ACL ARR July cycle after extensive revisions
[Progress] Participated in the AIGO program's one-day hackathon at NTU, won first prize
[Research] FORTRESS has underwent review for TMLR
[Progress] PATCH won first prize in school's research competition
[Progress] Won championship at Fushing Debate Open 2025 thanks to my amazing team!
[Honered] Excited to announce that I have been Honereded the Harvard Prize Book!
[Project] Kicked off the FORTRESS project, a RAG-inspired defense system
[Research] PATCH has been submitted to ACL ARR May cycle
[Milestone] Personal portfolio site launched ðŸŽ‰
